    3788             : 
    3789           0 : static a_boolean check_variant_path(an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    3790             :                                     a_constexpr_address   *addr,
    3791             :                                     a_boolean             release,
    3792             :                                     a_source_position     *pos)
    3793             : /*
    3794             : The given address entry has its CA_VARIANT_PATH flag set.  Check that it points
    3795             : to an object whose active variant subobjects match the recorded variant path
    3796             : and return TRUE if that's the case.  Otherwise, return FALSE and record an
    3797             : appropriate diagnostic.
    3798             : 
    3799             : If release is TRUE, release the variant path structures when the check is
    3800             : completed.
    3801             : */
    3802             : {
    3803           0 :   a_boolean  result = TRUE;
    3804           0 :   a_variant_path_entry_ptr
    3805           0 :              vpep = addr->variant.variant_path->next;
    3806             : 
    3807           0 :   do {
    3808           0 :     a_field_ptr  active_field = *(a_field_ptr*)vpep->base_address;
    3809           0 :     a_field_ptr  selected_field = vpep->field;
    3810           0 :     if (selected_field != active_field) {
    3811           0 :       do_constexpr_fail(result);
    3812           0 :       if (active_field != NULL) {
    3813           0 :         info_with_pos_sym2(ec_constexpr_union_field_inactive, pos,
    3814           0 :                            symbol_for(selected_field),
    3815           0 :                            symbol_for(active_field), ips);
    3816             :       } else {
    3817           0 :         info_with_pos_sym(ec_constexpr_no_active_union_field, pos,
    3818           0 :                           symbol_for(selected_field), ips);
    3819             :       }  /* if */
    3820             :       break;
    3821             :     }  /* if */
    3822           0 :     vpep = vpep->next;
    3823           0 :   } while (vpep != NULL);
    3824           0 :   if (release) {
    3825           0 :     release_variant_path(addr);
    3826             :   }  /* if */
    3827           0 :   return result;
    3828             : }  /* check_variant_path */
    3829             : 
    3830             : 
    3831             : /*
    3832             : Macro to call release_variant_path if a given address (possibly passed via a
    3833             : pointer to bytes representing that address) holds a variant path.
    3834             : */
    3835             : #define release_variant_path_if_needed(value)                                 \
    3836             : {                                                                             \
    3837             :   if (is_variant_path((a_constexpr_address*)(value))) {                       \
    3838             :     release_variant_path((a_constexpr_address*)(value));                      \
    3839             :   }  /* if */                                                                 \
    3840             : }  /* release_variant_path_if_needed */
    3841             : 
    3842             : 
    3843             : /*
    3844             : Macro to release structures allocated for the representation of the result of
    3845             : a glvalue or pointer expression (i.e., an a_constexpr_address value).  expr is
    3846             : the expression corresponding to the interpreter storage at value and tp is
    3847             : the type of expr after applying skip_typerefs.
    3848             : */
    3849             : #define release_address_structures(expr, tp, value)                           \
    3850             : {                                                                             \
    3851             :   if (((expr)->is_lvalue || (expr)->is_xvalue ||                              \
    3852             :        (tp)->kind == (a_type_kind)tk_pointer)) {                              \
    3853             :     release_variant_path_if_needed(value);                                    \
    3854             :   }  /* if */                                                                 \
    3855             : }  /* release_address_structures */
    3856             : 
    3857             : 
    3858             : /*
    3859             : For an interpreter value that is known to be an address, copy the associated
    3860             : structures (e.g., any variant path) so that they won't be shared with the
    3861             : address they were shallowly copied from.
    3862             : */
    3863             : #define copy_address_structures(value)                                        \
    3864             : {                                                                             \
    3865             :   a_constexpr_address  *addr = (a_constexpr_address *)(value);                \
    3866             :   if (is_variant_path(addr)) {                                                \
    3867             :     copy_variant_path(addr);                                                  \
    3868             :   }  /* if */                                                                 \
    3869             : }  /* copy_address_structures */

    3872           0 : static a_boolean is_integer_address(a_constexpr_address  *cap,

    3967           0 : static a_boolean translate_il_address_offset(an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    3968             :                                              a_constant_ptr        con,
    3969             :                                              a_constexpr_address   *cap,
    3970             :                                              a_type_ptr            obj_type)
    3971             : /*
    3972             : con is an address constant being translated to *cap, a representation in
    3973             : interpreter storage of the address of the complete object of type obj_type.

    3975             : */

    3985           0 :     if (t_offset == 0 && identical_types(subobj_type, obj_type)) {
    3986             :       /* *cap is fully updated. */

    4000           0 :           check_assertion(result);

    4085           0 :           check_assertion(selected_field != NULL);

    4088             :              traverses them explicitly (we'd account for them twice). */

    4091           0 :             last_entry = cap->variant.variant_path->next;

    4114           0 :           t_offset -= selected_field->offset;
    4115           0 :           get_mapped_byte_count(&persistent_map, selected_field, i_offset);
    4116           0 :           cap->address += i_offset;

    4118             :         }
    4119             :         break;
    4120           0 :       default:
    4121             :         /* Scalars are sometimes treated as arrays of one element. */
    4122           0 :         if (t_offset == (a_targ_ptrdiff_t)obj_type->size) {
    4123           0 :           i_size = value_bytes_for_type(ips, obj_type, &result); 
    4124           0 :           check_assertion(result);
    4125           0 :           cap->address += i_size;
    4126           0 :           cap->flags |= CA_CANNOT_DEREFERENCE;
    4127           0 :         } else if (t_offset != 0) {
    4128           0 :           do_constexpr_fail(result);
    4129           0 :           info_with_pos(ec_constexpr_bad_address, &ips->position, ips);
    4130             :         }  /* if */

    4134           0 : done:

    4139           0 : static void finalize_subobject_path(a_constant_ptr  con)
    4140             : /*
    4141             : con is a ck_address/abk_variable entry.  Make sure its subobject path is
    4142             : complete (it may be incomplete if the interpreter adjusted the offset because
    4143             : of subscript operations or pointer arithmetic).
    4144             : */
    4145             : {
    4146           0 :   a_type_ptr            obj_type, subobj_type;
    4147           0 :   a_variable_ptr        var;
    4148           0 :   a_targ_ptrdiff_t      t_offset, t_pos;
    4149           0 :   a_subobject_path_ptr  *p_subobj;
    4150             : 
    4151           0 :   check_assertion(constant_is(con, ck_address) &&
    4152             :                   con->variant.address.kind ==
    4153             :                                           (an_address_base_kind)abk_variable);
    4154           0 :   var = con->variant.address.variant.variable;
    4155           0 :   if (var == NULL) {
    4156             :     /* No actual variable. */
    4157           0 :     goto done;
    4158             :   }  /* if */
    4159           0 :   obj_type = skip_typerefs(var->type);
    4160           0 :   subobj_type = skip_typerefs(con->type);
    4161           0 :   subobj_type = skip_typerefs(subobj_type->variant.pointer.type);
    4162           0 :   p_subobj = &con->variant.address.subobject_path;
    4163           0 :   t_offset = con->variant.address.offset;
    4164           0 :   for (;;) {
    4165           0 :     if (t_offset == 0 && identical_types(subobj_type, obj_type)) {
    4166             :       /* The subobject path is complete. */
    4167             :       break;
    4168             :     }  /* if */
    4169           0 :     switch (obj_type->kind) {
    4170           0 :       case tk_array:
    4171           0 :         if (*p_subobj == NULL || (*p_subobj)->kind != iek_constant) {
    4172           0 :           a_subobject_path_ptr  tail = *p_subobj;
    4173           0 :           *p_subobj = alloc_subobject_path();

    5426             : Evaluate the (dynamic) initializer of the given variable.  Return FALSE if an
    5427             : error occurs and use pos as the default position for recorded diagnostics.
    5428             : If storage is non-NULL, it points to the storage occupied by the variable;

    5457             :     /* Release the ordinary storage stack blocks for this expression.
    5458             :        The large blocks will be released by the call to
    5459             :        restore_storage_stack below. */
    5460           0 :     release_constexpr_stack(&ips->storage_stack);
    5461             :   }  /* if */
    5462           0 :   restore_storage_stack(ips, saved_stack_for_full_expr);
    5463           0 :   return result;
    5464             : }  /* do_constexpr_init_variable */
    5465             : 
    5466             : 
    5467             : static a_boolean do_constexpr_condition_alloc(
    5468             :                                             an_interpreter_state   *ips,
    5469             :                                             an_expr_node_ptr       expr,
    5470             :                                             a_storage_stack_state  *vs_state)
    5471             : /*
    5472             : expr is an enk_condition node representing the condition expression of a
    5473             : statement (i.e., the <expr> in "if (<expr>) ...", "switch (<expr>) ...", etc.).
    5474             : Allocate and map the associated variable (it will be initialized by a call to
    5475             : do_constexpr_condition).  Save the previous storage state in *vs_state if
    5476             : successful.
    5477             : */
    5478             : {
    5479             :   a_boolean                   result = TRUE;
    5480             :   a_condition_supplement_ptr  csp = expr->variant.condition;
    5481             :   a_statement_ptr             init = csp->initialization;
    5482             :   a_dynamic_init_ptr          cond_var_init = csp->dynamic_init;
    5483             : 
    5484             :   if (cond_var_init == NULL && init == NULL) {
    5485             :     expect_error()
    5486             :     do_constexpr_fail(result);
    5487             :   } else {
    5488             :     save_storage_stack(ips, *vs_state);
    5489             :     if (init != NULL) {
    5490             :       if (init->kind == (a_statement_kind)stmk_decl) {
    5491             :         /* Allocate storage for any variables. */
    5492             :         an_il_entity_list_entry_ptr  p = init->variant.decl.entities;
    5493             :         for (; p != NULL; p = p->next) {
    5494             :           if (p->entity.kind == (a_byte_il_entry_kind)iek_variable) {
    5495             :             a_variable_ptr  vp = (a_variable_ptr)p->entity.ptr;
    5496             :             (void)do_constexpr_alloc_variable(ips, vp, &result);
    5497             :             if (!result) break;
    5498             :           }  /* if */
    5499             :         }  /* for */
    5500             :       } else if (init->kind == (a_statement_kind)stmk_expr) {
    5501             :         /* Nothing to allocate just now. */
    5502             :       } else {
    5503             :         unexpected_condition();
    5504             :       }  /* if */
    5505             :     }  /* if */
    5506             :     if (result && cond_var_init != NULL) {
    5507             :       a_variable_ptr  cond_var = cond_var_init->variable;
    5508             :       (void)do_constexpr_alloc_variable(ips, cond_var, &result);
    5509             :     }  /* if */
    5510             :     if (!result) {
    5511             :       restore_storage_stack(ips, *vs_state);
    5512             :     }  /* if */
    5513             :   }  /* if */
    5514             :   return result;
    5515             : }  /* do_constexpr_condition_alloc */
    5516             : 
    5517             : 
    5518             : static void do_constexpr_condition_dealloc(an_interpreter_state   *ips,
    5519             :                                            an_expr_node_ptr       expr,
    5520             :                                            a_storage_stack_state  *vs_state)
    5521             : /*
    5522             : expr is an enk_condition node representing the condition expression of a
    5523             : statement (i.e., the <expr> in "if (<expr>) ...", "switch (<expr>) ...", etc.).
    5524             : Deallocate and unmap all associated variables.  Restore the storage state
    5525             : recorded in *vs_state.
    5526             : */
    5527             : {
    5528             :   a_condition_supplement_ptr  csp = expr->variant.condition;
    5529             :   a_statement_ptr             init = csp->initialization;
    5530             :   a_dynamic_init_ptr          cond_var_init = csp->dynamic_init;
    5531             : 
    5532             :   if (cond_var_init != NULL) {
    5533             :     a_variable_ptr  cond_var = cond_var_init->variable;
    5534             :     do_constexpr_unmap_variable(ips, cond_var);
    5535             :   }  /* if */
    5536             :   if (init != NULL) {
    5537             :     if (init->kind == (a_statement_kind)stmk_decl) {
    5538             :       /* Unmap storage for all declared variables. */
    5539             :       an_il_entity_list_entry_ptr  p = init->variant.decl.entities;
    5540             :       for (; p != NULL; p = p->next) {
    5541             :         if (p->entity.kind == (a_byte_il_entry_kind)iek_variable) {
    5542             :           a_variable_ptr  vp = (a_variable_ptr)p->entity.ptr;
    5543             :           do_constexpr_unmap_variable(ips, vp);
    5544             :         }  /* if */
    5545             :       }  /* for */
    5546             :     }  /* if */
    5547             :   }  /* if */
    5548             :   /* Reclaim the storage of the variables that were unmapped above. */
    5549             :   restore_storage_stack(ips, *vs_state);
    5550             : }  /* do_constexpr_condition_dealloc */
    5551             : 
    5552             : 
    5553             : static a_boolean do_constexpr_condition(a_boolean             has_cond_var,
    5554             :                                         an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    5555             :                                         an_expr_node_ptr      expr,
    5556             :                                         a_type_ptr            expr_type,
    5557             :                                         a_byte                *value)
    5558             : /*
    5559             : Evaluate a condition expression (expr) of a statement (i.e., the <expr> in
    5560             : "if (<expr>) ...", "switch (<expr>) ...", etc.) and place the result in the
    5561             : storage pointed to by value.  If has_cond_var is TRUE, expr is an enk_condition
    5562             : node (such nodes are not handled by do_constexpr_expression).  expr_type is
    5563             : skip_typerefs(expr->type).
    5564             : */
    5565             : {
    5566             :   a_boolean              result = TRUE;
    5567             :   a_storage_stack_state  saved_stack_for_full_expr;
    5568             :   an_expr_node_ptr       expr_to_evaluate;
    5569             : 
    5570             :   save_storage_stack((ips), saved_stack_for_full_expr);
    5571             :   if (has_cond_var) {
    5572             :     a_condition_supplement_ptr  csp = expr->variant.condition;
    5573             :     a_dynamic_init_ptr          cond_var_init = csp->dynamic_init;
    5574             :     a_statement_ptr             init = csp->initialization;
    5575             :     if (init != NULL) {
    5576             :       /* A C++17-style initializer.  E.g., "if (int x = f(); x+1) ...". */
    5577             :       if (init->kind == (a_statement_kind)stmk_decl) {
    5578             :         /* Evaluate the initializer of each variable. */
    5579             :         an_il_entity_list_entry_ptr  p = init->variant.decl.entities;
    5580             :         for (; p != NULL; p = p->next) {
    5581             :           if (p->entity.kind == (a_byte_il_entry_kind)iek_variable) {
    5582             :             a_variable_ptr  vp = (a_variable_ptr)p->entity.ptr;
    5583             :             if (!do_constexpr_init_variable(
    5584             :                                          ips, vp, (a_byte*)NULL,
    5585             :                                          &vp->source_corresp.decl_position)) {
    5586             :               break;
    5587             :             }  /* if */
    5588             :           }  /* if */
    5589             :         }  /* for */
    5590             :       } else if (init->kind == (a_statement_kind)stmk_expr) {
    5591             :         result = do_constexpr_statement(ips, init);
    5592             :       } else {
    5593             :         unexpected_condition();
    5594             :       }  /* if */
    5595             :     }  /* if */
    5596             :     if (cond_var_init != NULL && result) {
    5597             :       a_variable_ptr  cond_var = cond_var_init->variable;
    5598             :       if (!do_constexpr_init_variable(
    5599             :                                   ips, cond_var, (a_byte*)NULL,
    5600             :                                    &cond_var->source_corresp.decl_position)) {
    5601             :         /* Zero the variable, so do_constexpr_condition_cleanup does not
    5602             :            attempt to access uninitialized storage. */
    5603             :         a_type_ptr    vtp = skip_typerefs(cond_var->type);
    5604             :         a_boolean     local_result = TRUE;
    5605             :         a_byte_count  n_bytes = value_bytes_for_type(ips, vtp, &local_result);
    5606             :         a_byte        *var_bytes;
    5607             :         check_assertion(local_result);
    5608             :         get_stack_bytes(ips, cond_var, var_bytes);
    5609             :         memzero(var_bytes, size_t_arg(n_bytes));
    5610             :       }  /* if */
    5611             :     }  /* if */
    5612             :     expr_to_evaluate = csp->expr;
    5613             :   } else {
    5614             :     result = TRUE;
    5615             :     expr_to_evaluate = expr;
    5616             :   }  /* if */
    5617             :   if (result &&
    5618             :       !do_constexpr_expression(ips, expr_to_evaluate, value, value)) {
    5619             :     result = FALSE;
    5620             :   }  /* if */
    5621             :   release_address_structures(expr, expr_type, value);
    5622             :   restore_storage_stack(ips, saved_stack_for_full_expr);
    5623             :   return result;
    5624             : }  /* do_constexpr_condition */
    5625             : 
    5626             : 
    5627             : static void do_constexpr_condition_cleanup(an_interpreter_state   *ips,
    5628             :                                            an_expr_node_ptr       expr)
    5629             : /*
    5630             : expr is an enk_condition node representing the condition expression of a
    5631             : statement (i.e., the <expr> in "if (<expr>) ...", "switch (<expr>) ...", etc.).
    5632             : Clean up the variable values (currently, that means disposing of the "variant
    5633             : path" structures).  This does not deallocate or unmap the variables (since for
    5634             : loop constructs they may be needed again).
    5635             : */
    5636             : {
    5637             :   a_condition_supplement_ptr  csp = expr->variant.condition;
    5638             :   a_statement_ptr             init = csp->initialization;
    5639             :   a_dynamic_init_ptr          cond_var_init = csp->dynamic_init;
    5640             : 
    5641             :   if (cond_var_init != NULL) {
    5642             :     a_variable_ptr  cond_var = cond_var_init->variable;
    5643             :     if (skip_typerefs(cond_var->type)->kind == (a_type_kind)tk_pointer) {
    5644             :       a_byte               *var_bytes;
    5645             :       a_constexpr_address  *cap;
    5646             :       get_stack_bytes(ips, cond_var, var_bytes);
    5647             :       cap = (a_constexpr_address*)var_bytes;
    5648             :       release_variant_path_if_needed(cap);
    5649             :     }  /* if */
    5650             :   }  /* if */
    5651             :   if (init != NULL) {
    5652             :     if (init->kind == (a_statement_kind)stmk_decl) {
    5653             :       /* Clean up side structures for any declared variables. */
    5654             :       an_il_entity_list_entry_ptr  p = init->variant.decl.entities;
    5655             :       for (; p != NULL; p = p->next) {
    5656             :         if (p->entity.kind == (a_byte_il_entry_kind)iek_variable) {
    5657             :           a_variable_ptr  vp = (a_variable_ptr)p->entity.ptr;
    5658             :           if (skip_typerefs(vp->type)->kind == (a_type_kind)tk_pointer) {
    5659             :             a_byte               *var_bytes;
    5660             :             a_constexpr_address  *cap;
    5661             :             get_stack_bytes(ips, vp, var_bytes);
    5662             :             cap = (a_constexpr_address*)var_bytes;
    5663             :             release_variant_path_if_needed(cap);
    5664             :           }  /* if */
    5665             :         }  /* if */
    5666             :       }  /* for */
    5667             :     }  /* if */
    5668             :   }  /* if */
    5669             : }  /* do_constexpr_condition_cleanup */
    5670             : 
    5671             : 
    5672             : static a_boolean init_static_variables(an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    5673             :                                        a_scope_ptr           scope)
    5674             : /*
    5675             : Initialize a limited set of local static variables.  This function should only
    5676             : be called for the local static variables associated with constructs like
    5677             : "__func__".
    5678             : */
    5679             : {
    5680             :   a_boolean       result = TRUE;
    5681             :   a_variable_ptr  vp = scope->variables;
    5682             : 
    5683             :   for (; vp != NULL; vp = vp->next) {
    5684             :     a_byte  *var_bytes;

    5686             :     if (var_bytes == NULL) {
    5687             :       a_type_ptr  tp = vp->type;
    5688             :       if (!is_const_qualified_type(tp) ||
    5689             :           is_volatile_qualified_type(tp) ||
    5690             :           vp->init_kind != (an_init_kind)initk_static ||
    5691             :           vp->initializer.constant == NULL) {
    5692             :         info_with_pos(ec_constexpr_access_to_runtime_storage,
    5693             :                       &vp->source_corresp.decl_position, ips);
    5694             :         do_constexpr_fail(result);
    5695             :         break;
    5696             :       }  /* if */
    5697             :       tp = skip_typerefs(tp);
    5698             :       alloc_static_object(ips, tp, var_bytes, &result);
    5699             :       if (!result) break;
    5700             :       map_stack_bytes(ips, vp, var_bytes);
    5701             :       result = extract_value_from_constant(ips, vp->initializer.constant,
    5702             :                                            var_bytes, var_bytes);
    5703             :       if (!result) break;
    5704             :     }  /* if */
    5705             :   }  /* for */
    5706             :   return result;
    5707             : }  /* initi_static_variables */
    5708             : 
    5709             : 
    5710             : static a_boolean do_constexpr_block_statement(an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    5711             :                                               a_statement_ptr       block_stmt,
    5712             :                                               a_scope_ptr           scope)
    5713             : /*
    5714             : Interpret the given block statement and its associated scope (if any).
    5715             : */
    5716             : {
    5717             :   a_boolean              result = TRUE, local_storage = FALSE;
    5718             :   a_storage_stack_state  saved_stack;
    5719             :   a_statement_ptr        stmt = block_stmt->variant.block.statements;
    5720             : 
    5721             :   init_storage_stack_state_to_silence_GCC(saved_stack);
    5722             :   if (scope != NULL) {
    5723             :     /* If local variables are going to be allocated (which will be done when
    5724             :        their corresponding stmk_init statement is interpreted), save the
    5725             :        current allocation state so we can efficiently deallocate those
    5726             :        variables below.  Also do this for the top-level block of a statement
    5727             :        because any parameters have already been associated with the allocation
    5728             :        sequence number about to be recorded. */
    5729             :     a_variable_ptr  vp = scope->nonstatic_variables;
    5730             :     if (vp != NULL || scope_is(scope, sck_function)) {
    5731             :       save_storage_stack(ips, saved_stack);
    5732             :       local_storage = TRUE;
    5733             :     }  /* if */
    5734             :     if (scope->variables != NULL) {
    5735             :       /* There are local static variables.  That is normally not possible in
    5736             :          constexpr functions, but in some modes the implied static variables
    5737             :          for __func__ and similar constructs are permitted. */
    5738             :       if (!init_static_variables(ips, scope)) {
    5739             :         result = FALSE;
    5740             :       }  /* if */
    5741             :     }  /* if */
    5742             :   }  /* if */
    5743             :   if (result) {
    5744             :     /* Interpret the statements in the block. */
    5745             :     for (; result && stmt != NULL; stmt = stmt->next) {
    5746             :       result = do_constexpr_statement(ips, stmt);
    5747             :       if (ips->curr_call_frame->return_active ||
    5748             :           ips->curr_call_frame->loop_break_active ||
    5749             :           ips->curr_call_frame->continue_active ||
    5750             :           ips->curr_call_frame->switch_break_active) {
    5751             :         /* A branching statement ends execution for this block. */
    5752             :         break;
    5753             :       }  /* if */
    5754             :     }  /* for */
    5755             :   }  /* if */
    5756             :   /* Release and unmap the local storage if necessary. */
    5757             :   if (local_storage) {
    5758             :     a_variable_ptr  vp = scope->nonstatic_variables;
    5759             :     for (; vp != NULL; vp = vp->next) {
    5760             :       if (skip_typerefs(vp->type)->kind == (a_type_kind)tk_pointer) {
    5761             :         a_byte  *var_bytes;
    5762             :         get_stack_bytes(ips, vp, var_bytes);
    5763             :         if (var_bytes != NULL && result) {
    5764             :           /* If interpretation failed, the initialization state of var_bytes
    5765             :              is uncertain.  Rely on reclaim_variant_path_entries to recover
    5766             :              entries in that case. */
    5767             :           release_variant_path_if_needed(var_bytes);
    5768             :         }  /* if */
    5769             :       }  /* if */
    5770             :       do_constexpr_unmap_variable(ips, vp);
    5771             :     }  /* for */
    5772             :     restore_storage_stack(ips, saved_stack);
    5773             :   }  /* if */
    5774             :   return result;
    5775             : }  /* do_constexpr_block_statement */
    5776             : 
    5777             : 
    5778           0 : static a_boolean do_constexpr_for_statement(an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    5779             :                                             a_statement_ptr       stmt,
    5780             :                                             a_boolean             do_continue)
    5781             : /*
    5782             : Interpret the given for-statement.  If do_continue is TRUE, we have jumped
    5783             : into the body of the loop and encountered a "continue" statement: Skip the
    5784             : initialization and execute the increment before the main iteration.
    5785             : */
    5786             : {
    5787           0 :   a_boolean              result = TRUE;
    5788           0 :   a_storage_stack_state  saved_stack, cond_saved_stack;
    5789           0 :   a_for_loop_ptr         loop_info = stmt->variant.for_loop.extra_info;
    5790           0 :   a_statement_ptr        init = loop_info->initialization;
    5791             : 
    5792             :   /* We may have to allocate storage for the increment expression result and/or
    5793             :      variables declared in the for-init declaration.  Save the current storage
    5794             :      state to enable deallocation when we're done. */
    5795           0 :   save_storage_stack(ips, saved_stack);
    5796             :   /* Run the initialization statement (if any). */
    5797           0 :   if (init != NULL && !do_continue && !do_constexpr_statement(ips, init)) {
    5798           0 :     do_constexpr_fail(result);
    5799             :   } else {
    5800           0 :     an_expr_node_ptr  expr = stmt->expr, incr = loop_info->increment;
    5801           0 :     a_byte            *expr_value, *incr_value;
    5802           0 :     a_type_ptr        tp, incr_type;

    5805           0 :     a_host_large_integer
    5806           0 :                       bool_val = FALSE;
    5807           0 :     if (expr != NULL) {
    5808             :       /* Allocate storage for the test expression result (a boolean). */
    5809           0 :       tp = skip_typerefs(expr->type);
    5810           0 :       n_bytes = expr_result_size(ips, expr, tp, &result);
    5811           0 :       alloc_complete_object(ips, n_bytes, tp, expr_value);
    5812             :       /* Check if we have to allocate a condition variable. */
    5813           0 :       has_cond_var = (expr->kind == (an_expr_node_kind)enk_condition);
    5814           0 :       if (has_cond_var &&
    5815           0 :           !do_constexpr_condition_alloc(ips, expr, &cond_saved_stack)) {
    5816           0 :         do_constexpr_fail(result);
    5817           0 :         has_cond_var = FALSE;
    5818           0 :         goto unmap_storage;
    5819             :       }  /* if */
    5820             :     } else {
    5821             :       has_cond_var = FALSE;
    5822             :       /* Needed only to avoid spurious GNU compiler optimizer
    5823             :          warnings. */
    5824             :       tp = NULL;
    5825             :       expr_value = NULL;
    5826             :     }  /* if */
    5827           0 :     incr = loop_info->increment;
    5828           0 :     if (incr != NULL) {
    5829           0 :       incr_type = skip_typerefs(incr->type);
    5830           0 :       n_bytes = expr_result_size(ips, incr, incr_type, &result);
    5831           0 :       if (!result) goto unmap_storage;
    5832           0 :       alloc_complete_object(ips, n_bytes, incr_type, incr_value);
    5833           0 :       if (do_continue) {
    5834             :         /* This function was called to implement a "continue" statement after
    5835             :            having jumped into the loop body (through a switch statement). The
    5836             :            loop increment has to be executed first. */
    5837           0 :         do_constexpr_full_expression(
    5838           0 :                                    ips, incr, incr_value, incr_value, result);
    5839           0 :         if (result) {
    5840           0 :           release_address_structures(incr, incr_type, incr_value);
    5841             :         } else {
    5842             :           /* The initialization state of incr_value is uncertain.
    5843             :              Rely on reclaim_variant_path_entries to recover entries
    5844             :              in that case. */
    5845             :         }  /* if */
    5846             :       }  /* if */
    5847             :     } else {
    5848             :       /* To avoid spurious warnings from certain tools. */
    5849           0 :       incr_type = NULL;
    5850           0 :       incr_value = expr_value;
    5851             :     }  /* if */
    5852           0 :     do {
    5853             :       /* Evaluate the test expression. */
    5854           0 :       if (cost_exceeded(ips)) {
    5855           0 :         more_info_diagnostic(ec_excessive_constexpr_complexity, &ips->position,
    5856           0 :                              &ips->diag_list);
    5857           0 :         do_constexpr_fail(result);
    5858           0 :       } else if (expr != NULL) {
    5859           0 :         result = do_constexpr_condition(has_cond_var, ips, expr, tp,
    5860             :                                         expr_value);
    5861           0 :         ips->cost += 1;
    5862             :       }  /* if */
    5863           0 :       if (result) {
    5864             :         /* Evaluation of the test expression succeeded.  Get its value
    5865             :            to see if the dependent statement should be executed. */
    5866           0 :         if (expr != NULL) {
    5867           0 :           get_int_val_from(expr_value, tp, bool_val, ovfl);
    5868             :         } else {
    5869             :           bool_val = TRUE;
    5870             :           ovfl = FALSE;
    5871             :         }  /* if */
    5872           0 :         if (!ovfl && bool_val) {
    5873             :           /* Execute the dependent statement. */
    5874           0 :           result = do_constexpr_statement(
    5875             :                                        ips, stmt->variant.for_loop.statement);
    5876           0 :           if (result) {
    5877             :             /* Execution of the dependent statement succeeded, so evaluate
    5878             :                the increment expression (if any) unless we hit a branching
    5879             :                statement. */
    5880           0 :             if (ips->curr_call_frame->return_active) {
    5881             :               /* Stop the loop (leave the flag active since we may have to
    5882             :                  break out of other constructs). */
    5883             :               bool_val = FALSE;
    5884           0 :             } else if (ips->curr_call_frame->loop_break_active) {
    5885             :               /* Stop the loop (which completes the execution of the break
    5886             :                  statement). */
    5887           0 :               ips->curr_call_frame->loop_break_active = FALSE;
    5888           0 :               bool_val = FALSE;
    5889             :             } else {
    5890           0 :               if (ips->curr_call_frame->continue_active) {
    5891             :                 /* Continue, but clear the continue_active flag since we've
    5892             :                    reached the point of continuation. */
    5893           0 :                 ips->curr_call_frame->continue_active = FALSE;
    5894             :               }  /* if */
    5895           0 :               if (incr != NULL) {
    5896           0 :                 do_constexpr_full_expression(
    5897           0 :                                    ips, incr, incr_value, incr_value, result);

    5905             :               }  /* if */
    5906             :             }  /* if */

    5908             :         }  /* if */

    5911           0 :         do_constexpr_condition_cleanup(ips, expr);
    5912             :       }  /* if */

    5914           0 : unmap_storage:

    5916           0 :       do_constexpr_condition_dealloc(ips, expr, &cond_saved_stack);
    5917             :     }  /* if */

    5934           0 : static a_boolean do_constexpr_range_based_for_statement(
    5935             :                                                    an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    5936             :                                                    a_statement_ptr       stmt)

    6064           0 : static a_boolean do_constexpr_switch(an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    6065             :                                      a_statement_ptr       stmt)
    6066             : /*
    6067             : Interpret the given switch statement.  Return TRUE if the statement was

    6279             : 
    6280          88 : static a_boolean do_constexpr_statement(an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    6281             :                                         a_statement_ptr       stmt)
    6282             : /*
    6283             : Interpret the given statement.  Return TRUE if the statement was
    6284             : successfully interpreted, FALSE otherwise.
    6285             : */
    6286             : {
    6287          88 :   a_boolean             result = TRUE;
    6288          88 :   an_expr_node_ptr      expr;
    6289          88 :   a_byte                *expr_value;
    6290          88 :   a_storage_stack_state saved_stack;
    6291          88 :   a_type_ptr            tp;
    6292          88 :   a_boolean             ovfl;
    6293          88 :   a_byte_count          n_bytes;

    6295          88 :   switch (stmt->kind) {
    6296           0 :     case stmk_expr:
    6297             :       {
    6298           0 :         expr = stmt->expr;
    6299           0 :         tp = skip_typerefs(expr->type);
    6300           0 :         n_bytes = expr_result_size(ips, expr, tp, &result);
    6301           0 :         save_storage_stack(ips, saved_stack);
    6302           0 :         alloc_complete_object(ips, n_bytes, tp, expr_value);
    6303           0 :         if (!result) {
    6304             :           /* Stop interpretation. */
    6305           0 :         } else if (!do_constexpr_expression(
    6306             :                                          ips, expr, expr_value, expr_value)) {
    6307           0 :           do_constexpr_fail(result);
    6308             :         } else {
    6309           0 :           release_address_structures(expr, tp, expr_value);
    6310             :         }  /* if */
    6311           0 :         restore_storage_stack(ips, saved_stack);
    6312             :       }
    6313             :       break;
    6314           0 :     case stmk_if:
    6315             :     case stmk_constexpr_if:
    6316             :       {
    6317           0 :         a_boolean             has_cond_var;
    6318           0 :         a_host_large_integer  bool_val;
    6319           0 :         a_statement_ptr       then_statement, else_statement;

    6321           0 :           then_statement = stmt->variant.if_stmt.then_statement;
    6322           0 :           else_statement = stmt->variant.if_stmt.else_statement;
    6323             :         } else {
    6324           0 :           then_statement = stmt->variant.constexpr_if->then_statement;
    6325           0 :           else_statement = stmt->variant.constexpr_if->else_statement;

    6328             :         /* Check if we have to allocate a condition variable. */
    6329           0 :         has_cond_var = (expr->kind == (an_expr_node_kind)enk_condition);
    6330           0 :         if (has_cond_var &&
    6331           0 :             !do_constexpr_condition_alloc(ips, expr, &saved_stack)) {
    6332           0 :           do_constexpr_fail(result);
    6333           0 :           break;
    6334             :         }  /* if */
    6335             :         /* The type of the test expression is known to be bool. */
    6336           0 :         tp = skip_typerefs(expr->type);
    6337           0 :         n_bytes = value_bytes_for_type(ips, tp, &result);
    6338           0 :         alloc_complete_object(ips, n_bytes, tp, expr_value);

    6588             : static a_boolean do_constexpr_builtin_fptest(
    6589             :                                       a_routine_ptr            callee,
    6590             :                                       a_float_kind             fpkind,
    6591             :                                       an_internal_float_value  *fpval,
    6592             :                                       a_byte                   *result_storage)
    6593             : /*
    6594             : callee is a GNU floating-point test function to which the floating-point value
    6595             : fpval of the given kind is passed.  Place in *result_storage the result of the
    6596             : test function (a boolean integer value) and return TRUE, or, if the test
    6597             : cannot be evaluated, return FALSE.
    6598             : */
    6599             : {
    6600             :   a_boolean  val = FALSE, result = TRUE;
    6601             : 
    6602             :   switch (callee->variant.builtin_function_kind) {
    6603             :     case bfk_isnan:
    6604             :     case bfk_isnanf:
    6605             :     case bfk_isnanl:
    6606             :       val = fp_is_nan(fpval, fpkind);
    6607             :       break;
    6608             :     case bfk_isinf:
    6609             :     case bfk_isinff:
    6610             :     case bfk_isinfl:
    6611             :       val = fp_is_infinity(fpval, fpkind);
    6612             :       break;
    6613             :     case bfk_isfinite:
    6614             :       val = !fp_is_infinity(fpval, fpkind) && !fp_is_nan(fpval, fpkind);
    6615             :       break;
    6616             :     case bfk_isnormal:
    6617             :       { a_boolean  unknown_result;
    6618             :         val = fp_is_normalized(fpval, fpkind, &unknown_result);
    6619             :         if (unknown_result) {
    6620             :           do_constexpr_fail(result);
    6621             :         }  /* if */
    6622             :       }
    6623             :       break;
    6624             :     case bfk_signbit:
    6625             :     case bfk_signbitf:
    6626             :     case bfk_signbitl:
    6627             :       if (fp_is_nan(fpval, fpkind)) {
    6628             :         /* We don't currently attempt to determine the sign bit of a NaN
    6629             :            value.  (This matches Clang but not GCC.) */
    6630             :         do_constexpr_fail(result);
    6631             :       } else {
    6632             :         val = fp_signbit(fpkind, fpval);
    6633             :       }  /* if */
    6634             :       break;
    6635             :     default:
    6636             :       unexpected_condition();
    6637             :   }  /* switch */
    6638             :   if (result) {
    6639             :     *(an_integer_value *)result_storage = val ? one_int : zero_int;
    6640             :   }  /* if */
    6641             :   return result;
    6642             : }  /* do_constexpr_builtin_fptest */
