    6644             : 
    6645             : static a_boolean do_constexpr_builtin_bitcount(a_routine_ptr  callee,
    6646             :                                                a_byte         *arg_bytes,
    6647             :                                                a_type_ptr     arg_tp,
    6648             :                                                a_byte         *result_storage)
    6649             : /*
    6650             : Evaluate the builtin bit counting function indicated by callee on the operand
    6651             : of type arg_tp stored in arg_bytes.  Place the result in *result_storage.
    6652             : This function currently always returns TRUE.
    6653             : */
    6654             : {
    6655             :   a_builtin_function_kind  bfk;
    6656             :   a_targ_size_t            k, n_bits, count = 0;
    6657             :   an_integer_value         arg;
    6658             : 
    6659             :   bfk = (a_builtin_function_kind)callee->variant.builtin_function_kind;
    6660             :   arg = *(an_integer_value*)arg_bytes;
    6661             :   check_assertion(arg_tp->kind == (a_type_kind)tk_integer);
    6662             :   n_bits = arg_tp->size*CHAR_BIT;
    6663             :   for (k = 0; k < n_bits; ++k) {
    6664             :     a_boolean         bit, ovflo;
    6665             :     an_integer_value  mask = one_int;
    6666             :     shift_left_integer_value(&mask, (int)k, &ovflo);
    6667             :     check_assertion(!ovflo);
    6668             :     and_integer_values(&mask, &arg);
    6669             :     bit = cmp_integer_values(&mask, /*op_1_signed=*/FALSE,
    6670             :                              &zero_int, /*op_2_signed=*/FALSE) != 0;
    6671             :     switch (bfk) {
    6672             :       case bfk_ffs:
    6673             :       case bfk_ffsl:
    6674             : #if LONG_LONG_ALLOWED
    6675             :       case bfk_ffsll:
    6676             : #endif /* LONG_LONG_ALLOWED */
    6677             :         /* Index of the least significant 1-bit. */
    6678             :         if (bit) {
    6679             :           count = k+1;
    6680             :           goto count_done;
    6681             :         }  /* if */
    6682             :         break;
    6683             :       case bfk_clz:
    6684             :       case bfk_clzl:
    6685             : #if LONG_LONG_ALLOWED
    6686             :       case bfk_clzll:
    6687             : #endif /* LONG_LONG_ALLOWED */
    6688             :         /* Count of leading zeros. */
    6689             :         count = bit ? 0 : count+1;
    6690             :         break;
    6691             :       case bfk_ctz:
    6692             :       case bfk_ctzl:
    6693             : #if LONG_LONG_ALLOWED
    6694             :       case bfk_ctzll:
    6695             : #endif /* LONG_LONG_ALLOWED */
    6696             :         /* Count of trailing zeros. */
    6697             :         if (bit) {
    6698             :           goto count_done;
    6699             :         } else {
    6700             :           ++count;
    6701             :         }  /* if */
    6702             :         break;
    6703             :       case bfk_popcount:
    6704             :       case bfk_popcountl:
    6705             : #if LONG_LONG_ALLOWED
    6706             :       case bfk_popcountll:
    6707             : #endif /* LONG_LONG_ALLOWED */
    6708             :         /* Count of ones. */
    6709             :         if (bit) count += 1;
    6710             :         break;
    6711             :       case bfk_parity:
    6712             :       case bfk_parityl:
    6713             : #if LONG_LONG_ALLOWED
    6714             :       case bfk_parityll:
    6715             : #endif /* LONG_LONG_ALLOWED */
    6716             :         /* Count of ones. */
    6717             :         if (bit) count = (count+1) & 1;
    6718             :         break;
    6719             :       default:
    6720             :         unexpected_condition();
    6721             :     }  /* switch */
    6722             :   }  /* for */
    6723             : count_done:
    6724             :   set_integer_value((an_integer_value*)result_storage,
    6725             :                     (a_host_large_integer)count);
    6726             :   return TRUE;
    6727             : }  /* do_constexpr_builtin_bitcount */
    6728             : 
    6729             : 
    6730             : static a_boolean do_constexpr_builtin_strlen(
    6731             :                                         an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    6732             :                                         a_byte                *arg_bytes,
    6733             :                                         a_type_ptr            arg_tp,
    6734             :                                         an_expr_node_ptr      call_node,
    6735             :                                         a_byte                *result_storage)
    6736             : /*
    6737             : Evaluate the standard strlen/wcslen function on the operand of type arg_tp
    6738             : stored in arg_bytes.  Place the result in *result_storage.  Return FALSE if
    6739             : this fails (because the entity pointed to is not a null-terminated string) and
    6740             : record a potential diagnostic for the given expression node and interpreter
    6741             : state.
    6742             : */
    6743             : {
    6744             :   a_boolean  result = TRUE;
    6745             : 
    6746             :   if (arg_tp->kind == (a_type_kind)tk_pointer) {
    6747             :     a_constexpr_address  *addr = (a_constexpr_address*)arg_bytes;
    6748             :     a_type_ptr           tp = skip_typerefs(arg_tp->variant.pointer.type);
    6749             :     if (addr->address == NULL) {
    6750             :       do_constexpr_fail(result);
    6751             :       info_with_pos((is_runtime_data_address(addr) &&
    6752             :                      constant_is(addr->variant.addr_con, ck_integer)) ?
    6753             :                                         ec_constexpr_null_dereference :
    6754             :                                         ec_constexpr_access_to_runtime_storage,
    6755             :                     &call_node->variant.operation.operands->next->position,
    6756             :                     ips);
    6757             :     } else if (is_array_element(addr) && tp->kind == (a_type_kind)tk_integer) {
    6758             :       an_integer_value  *ptr = (an_integer_value*)addr->address;
    6759             :       a_byte_count  elem_size, pos, max_len, len = 0;
    6760             :       get_array_pos(ips, addr, tp, &max_len, &pos, &elem_size, &result);
    6761             :       if (result) {
    6762             :         max_len -= pos;
    6763             :         while (cmp_integer_values(ptr, /*op_1_signed=*/FALSE,
    6764             :                                   (an_integer_value *)&zero_int,
    6765             :                                   /*op_2_signed=*/FALSE) != 0) {
    6766             :           len += 1;
    6767             :           ptr += 1;
    6768             :           if (len == max_len) {
    6769             :             an_expr_node_ptr  arg = call_node->variant.operation.operands;
    6770             :             arg = arg->next;
    6771             :             do_constexpr_fail(result);
    6772             :             info_with_pos(ec_constexpr_string_not_null_terminated,
    6773             :                           &arg->position, ips);
    6774             :             break;
    6775             :           }  /* if */
    6776             :         }  /* while */
    6777             :         if (result) {
    6778             :           set_integer_value((an_integer_value*)result_storage,
    6779             :                             (a_host_large_integer)len);
    6780             :         }  /* if */
    6781             :       }  /* if */
    6782             :     }  /* if */
    6783             :   } else {
    6784             :     unexpected_condition();
    6785             :   }  /* if */
    6786             :   return result;
    6787             : }  /* do_constexpr_builtin_strlen */
    6788             : 
    6789             : 
    6790             : static a_boolean do_constexpr_builtin_strchr(
    6791             :                                       an_interpreter_state    *ips,
    6792             :                                       a_byte                  *arg1_bytes,
    6793             :                                       a_type_ptr              arg1_tp,
    6794             :                                       a_byte                  *arg2_bytes,
    6795             :                                       a_type_ptr              arg2_tp,
    6796             :                                       a_byte                  *arg3_bytes,
    6797             :                                       a_type_ptr              arg3_tp,
    6798             :                                       an_expr_node_ptr        call_node,
    6799             :                                       a_byte                  *result_storage)
    6800             : /*
    6801             : Evaluate the strchr/memchr/wcschr/wmemchr family of builtin functions.
    6802             : argX_bytes and argX_tp specify the operands and their types (arg3_bytes and
    6803             : arg3_tp are NULL in cases where a count argument is not specified).  Place the
    6804             : result in *result_storage.  Return FALSE if this fails (e.g., because the
    6805             : entity pointed to is not a null-terminated string) and record a potential
    6806             : diagnostic for the given expression node and interpreter state.
    6807             : */
    6808             : {
    6809             :   a_boolean  result = TRUE;
    6810             : 
    6811             :   if (arg1_tp->kind == (a_type_kind)tk_pointer) {
    6812             :     a_constexpr_address  *addr = (a_constexpr_address*)arg1_bytes;
    6813             :     a_type_ptr           tp = skip_typerefs(arg1_tp->variant.pointer.type);
    6814             :     if (addr->address == NULL) {
    6815             :       do_constexpr_fail(result);
    6816             :       info_with_pos((is_runtime_data_address(addr) &&
    6817             :                      constant_is(addr->variant.addr_con, ck_integer)) ?
    6818             :                                         ec_constexpr_null_dereference :
    6819             :                                         ec_constexpr_access_to_runtime_storage,
    6820             :                     &call_node->variant.operation.operands->next->position,
    6821             :                     ips);
    6822             :     } else if (is_array_element(addr)) {
    6823             :       an_integer_value  *ptr = (an_integer_value*)addr->address;
    6824             :       an_integer_value  len, max_len, *eff_max;
    6825             :       a_byte_count  elem_size, pos, max;
    6826             :       if (tp == void_type()) {
    6827             :         /* In the memchr case, the argument is "void *"; treat as "char *". */
    6828             :         tp = integer_type(plain_char_int_kind);
    6829             :       } else {
    6830             :         check_assertion(tp->kind == (a_type_kind)tk_integer);
    6831             :       }  /* if */
    6832             :       get_array_pos(ips, addr, tp, &max, &pos, &elem_size, &result);
    6833             :       if (result) {
    6834             :         a_boolean     check_for_read_past_operand = FALSE;
    6835             :         an_error_code error_code = ec_no_error;
    6836             :         check_assertion(f_skip_typerefs(arg2_tp)->kind ==
    6837             :                                                       (a_type_kind)tk_integer);
    6838             :         max -= pos;
    6839             :         set_integer_value(&max_len, (a_host_large_integer)max);
    6840             :         set_integer_value(&len, (a_host_large_integer)0);
    6841             :         /* Use the size of the array as a count (but see below). */
    6842             :         eff_max = &max_len;
    6843             :         if (arg3_bytes != NULL) {
    6844             :           check_assertion(arg3_tp != NULL &&
    6845             :                           f_skip_typerefs(arg3_tp)->kind ==
    6846             :                                                       (a_type_kind)tk_integer);
    6847             :           if (cmp_integer_values(&max_len, /*op_1_signed=*/FALSE,
    6848             :                                  (an_integer_value *)arg3_bytes,
    6849             :                                  /*op_2_signed=*/FALSE) >= 0) {
    6850             :             /* The user-specified count is less than the array count so use
    6851             :                that. */
    6852             :             eff_max = (an_integer_value *)arg3_bytes;
    6853             :           } else {
    6854             :             /* The user-specified count is more than the array count, so if
    6855             :                the item isn't found, we've gone past the array. */
    6856             :             check_for_read_past_operand = TRUE;
    6857             :           }  /* if */
    6858             :         }  /* if */
    6859             :         for (;cmp_integer_values(&len, /*op_1_signed=*/FALSE, eff_max,
    6860             :                                  /*op_2_signed=*/FALSE);
    6861             :              ptr++, incr_integer_value(&len)) {
    6862             :           if (cmp_integer_values(ptr, /*op_1_signed=*/FALSE,
    6863             :                                  (an_integer_value *)arg2_bytes,
    6864             :                                  /*op_2_signed=*/FALSE) == 0) {
    6865             :             /* The item has been found. */
    6866             :             goto return_result;
    6867             :           }  /* if */
    6868             :           if (arg3_bytes == NULL) {
    6869             :             if (cmp_integer_values(ptr, /*op_1_signed=*/FALSE,
    6870             :                                    (an_integer_value *)&zero_int,
    6871             :                                    /*op_2_signed=*/FALSE) == 0) {
    6872             :               /* In the string case, we've found the end of the string, so the
    6873             :                  item was not found (but this does not result in an error). */
    6874             :               ptr = NULL;
    6875             :               goto return_result;
    6876             :             }  /* if */
    6877             :           }  /* if */
    6878             :         }  /* for */
    6879             :         /* The entire object has been exhausted without finding a match.  In
    6880             :            the string case, this is an error (as an upper bound on the string
    6881             :            size was reached), in the memchr/wmemchr cases, this simply
    6882             :            returns NULL, unless we ran off the end of the object. */
    6883             :         ptr = NULL;
    6884             :         if (arg3_bytes == NULL) {
    6885             :           error_code = ec_constexpr_string_not_null_terminated;
    6886             :         } else if (check_for_read_past_operand) {
    6887             :           error_code = ec_attempt_to_read_past_end_of_object;
    6888             :         }  /* if */
    6889             :         if (error_code) {
    6890             :           an_expr_node_ptr  arg = call_node->variant.operation.operands;
    6891             :           arg = arg->next;
    6892             :           do_constexpr_fail(result);
    6893             :           info_with_pos(error_code, &arg->position, ips);
    6894             :         }  /* if */
    6895             : return_result:
    6896             :         if (result) {
    6897             :           if (ptr == NULL) {
    6898             :             clear_address(addr, (a_byte*)NULL);
    6899             :           } else {
    6900             :             addr->address = (a_byte*)ptr;
    6901             :           }  /* if */
    6902             :           *(a_constexpr_address*)result_storage = *(a_constexpr_address*)addr;
    6903             :         }  /* if */
    6904             :       }  /* if */
    6905             :     }  /* if */
    6906             :   } else {
    6907             :     unexpected_condition();
    6908             :   }  /* if */
    6909             :   return result;
    6910             : }  /* do_constexpr_builtin_strchr */
    6911             : 
    6912             : 
    6913             : static a_boolean do_constexpr_builtin_strcmp(
    6914             :                                       an_interpreter_state    *ips,
    6915             :                                       a_boolean               is_memcmp,
    6916             :                                       a_byte                  *arg1_bytes,
    6917             :                                       a_type_ptr              arg1_tp,
    6918             :                                       a_byte                  *arg2_bytes,
    6919             :                                       a_type_ptr              arg2_tp,
    6920             :                                       a_byte                  *arg3_bytes,
    6921             :                                       a_type_ptr              arg3_tp,
    6922             :                                       an_expr_node_ptr        call_node,
    6923             :                                       a_byte                  *result_storage)
    6924             : /*
    6925             : Evaluate the strcmp/memcmp/wcscmp/wcsncmp/wmemcmp/strncmp family of builtin
    6926             : functions.  If is_memcmp is TRUE, the builtin is either memcmp or wmemcmp (and
    6927             : a NULL character doesn't terminate the comparison).  argX_bytes and argX_tp
    6928             : specify the operands and their types (arg3_bytes and arg3_tp are NULL in cases
    6929             : where a count argument is not specified).  Place the result in *result_storage.
    6930             : Return FALSE if this fails (e.g., because the entity pointed to is not a
    6931             : null-terminated string) and record a potential diagnostic for the given
    6932             : expression node and interpreter state.
    6933             : */
    6934             : {
    6935             :   a_boolean  result = TRUE;
    6936             : 
    6937             :   if (arg1_tp->kind == (a_type_kind)tk_pointer &&
    6938             :       arg2_tp->kind == (a_type_kind)tk_pointer) {
    6939             :     a_constexpr_address  *addr1 = (a_constexpr_address*)arg1_bytes;
    6940             :     a_constexpr_address  *addr2 = (a_constexpr_address*)arg2_bytes;
    6941             :     a_type_ptr           tp = skip_typerefs(arg1_tp->variant.pointer.type);
    6942             :     if (addr1->address == NULL) {
    6943             :       do_constexpr_fail(result);
    6944             :       info_with_pos((is_runtime_data_address(addr1) &&
    6945             :                      constant_is(addr1->variant.addr_con, ck_integer)) ?
    6946             :                                         ec_constexpr_null_dereference :
    6947             :                                         ec_constexpr_access_to_runtime_storage,
    6948             :                     &call_node->variant.operation.operands->next->position,
    6949             :                     ips);
    6950             :     } else if (addr2->address == NULL) {
    6951             :       do_constexpr_fail(result);
    6952             :       info_with_pos((is_runtime_data_address(addr2) &&
    6953             :                      constant_is(addr2->variant.addr_con, ck_integer)) ?
    6954             :                                         ec_constexpr_null_dereference :
    6955             :                                         ec_constexpr_access_to_runtime_storage,
    6956             :                   &call_node->variant.operation.operands->next->next->position,
    6957             :                   ips);
    6958             :     } else if (is_array_element(addr1) && is_array_element(addr2)) {
    6959             :       an_integer_value  *ptr1 = (an_integer_value*)addr1->address;
    6960             :       an_integer_value  *ptr2 = (an_integer_value*)addr2->address;
    6961             :       an_integer_value  len, max_len, *eff_max;
    6962             :       a_byte_count      elem_size1, pos1, max1;
    6963             :       a_byte_count      elem_size2, pos2, max2;
    6964             :       int               ret_val;
    6965             :       if (tp == void_type()) {
    6966             :         /* In the memcmp case, the arguments are "void *"; treat them as
    6967             :            "char *". */
    6968             :         tp = integer_type(plain_char_int_kind);
    6969             :       } else {
    6970             :         check_assertion(tp->kind == (a_type_kind)tk_integer);
    6971             :       }  /* if */
    6972             :       get_array_pos(ips, addr1, tp, &max1, &pos1, &elem_size1, &result);
    6973             :       get_array_pos(ips, addr2, tp, &max2, &pos2, &elem_size2, &result);
    6974             :       if (result) {
    6975             :         a_boolean     check_for_read_past_operand = FALSE;
    6976             :         max1 -= pos1;
    6977             :         max2 -= pos2;
    6978             :         /* Use the minimum of the two object sizes for the loop below. */
    6979             :         set_integer_value(&max_len,
    6980             :                           (a_host_large_integer)(max1 > max2) ? max2 : max1);
    6981             :         set_integer_value(&len, (a_host_large_integer)0);
    6982             :         eff_max = &max_len;
    6983             :         if (arg3_bytes != NULL) {
    6984             :           check_assertion(arg3_tp != NULL &&
    6985             :                           f_skip_typerefs(arg3_tp)->kind ==
    6986             :                                                       (a_type_kind)tk_integer);
    6987             :           if (cmp_integer_values(&max_len, /*op_1_signed=*/FALSE,
    6988             :                                  (an_integer_value *)arg3_bytes,
    6989             :                                  /*op_2_signed=*/FALSE) >= 0) {
    6990             :             /* The user-specified count is less than the array count so use
    6991             :                that. */
    6992             :             eff_max = (an_integer_value *)arg3_bytes;
    6993             :           } else {
    6994             :             /* The user-specified count is more than the array count, so if
    6995             :                a difference isn't found, we've gone past the array. */
    6996             :             check_for_read_past_operand = TRUE;
    6997             :           }  /* if */
    6998             :         }  /* if */
    6999             :         for (;cmp_integer_values(&len, /*op_1_signed=*/FALSE, eff_max,
    7000             :                                  /*op_2_signed=*/FALSE);
    7001             :              ptr1++, ptr2++, incr_integer_value(&len)) {
    7002             :           ret_val = cmp_integer_values(ptr1, /*op_1_signed=*/FALSE, ptr2,
    7003             :                                        /*op_2_signed=*/FALSE);
    7004             :           if (ret_val != 0) {
    7005             :             /* The comparison is finished. */
    7006             :             goto return_result;
    7007             :           }  /* if */
    7008             :           if (!is_memcmp &&
    7009             :               (cmp_integer_values(ptr1, /*op_1_signed=*/FALSE,
    7010             :                                   (an_integer_value *)&zero_int,
    7011             :                                   /*op_2_signed=*/FALSE) == 0 ||
    7012             :                cmp_integer_values(ptr2, /*op_1_signed=*/FALSE,
    7013             :                                   (an_integer_value *)&zero_int,
    7014             :                                   /*op_2_signed=*/FALSE) == 0)) {
    7015             :             /* In the string case, one of the strings has reached the NULL
    7016             :                terminating character (but not both). */
    7017             :             ret_val = 0;
    7018             :             goto return_result;
    7019             :           }  /* if */
    7020             :         }  /* for */
    7021             :         /* No difference has been found. */
    7022             :         ret_val = 0;
    7023             :         if (check_for_read_past_operand) {
    7024             :           /* If the user-specified length is greater than the sizes of the
    7025             :              objects, this is an attempt to read past the end of the object. */
    7026             :           an_expr_node_ptr  arg = call_node->variant.operation.operands;
    7027             :           arg = arg->next;
    7028             :           if (max2 < max1) {
    7029             :             arg = arg->next;
    7030             :           }  /* if */
    7031             :           do_constexpr_fail(result);
    7032             :           info_with_pos(ec_attempt_to_read_past_end_of_object, &arg->position,
    7033             :                         ips);
    7034             :         }  /* if */
    7035             : return_result:
    7036             :         if (result) {
    7037             :           set_integer_value((an_integer_value*)result_storage,
    7038             :                             (a_host_large_integer)ret_val);
    7039             :         }  /* if */
    7040             :       }  /* if */
    7041             :     }  /* if */
    7042             :   } else {
    7043             :     unexpected_condition();
    7044             :   }  /* if */
    7045             :   return result;
    7046             : }  /* do_constexpr_builtin_strcmp */
    7047             : 
    7048             : 
    7049             : static a_boolean do_constexpr_builtin_function(
    7050             :                                         an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    7051             :                                         a_routine_ptr         callee,
    7052             :                                         an_expr_node_ptr      call_node,
    7053             :                                         a_byte                *result_storage,
    7054             :                                         a_boolean             *p_result)
    7055             : /*
    7056             : call_node represents a call to the given callee, which is a builtin function.
    7057             : If the call belongs to the class of builtin functions that can sometimes be
    7058             : folded (i.e., it is effectively "constexpr"), return TRUE; otherwise, return
    7059             : FALSE.  If TRUE if returned, but folding was not successful, *p_result is set
    7060             : to FALSE and the reason for the failure is recorded in *ips.
    7061             : */
    7062             : {
    7063             :   a_boolean         interpreted, err = FALSE, depends_on_fp_mode;
    7064             :   a_boolean         has_count = FALSE, is_memcmp = FALSE;
    7065             :   an_expr_node_ptr  args = call_node->variant.operation.operands->next;
    7066             :   an_expr_node_ptr  args2, args3;
    7067             :   a_byte            *arg1_bytes, *arg2_bytes, *arg3_bytes;
    7068             : 
    7069             :   ips->cost += 1;
    7070             :   switch (callee->variant.builtin_function_kind) {
    7071             :     case bfk_constant_p:
    7072             :       if (ips->curr_call_frame == NULL) {
    7073             :         /* Do not attempt interpreting __builtin_constant_p as an argument to
    7074             :            a top-level call, because we don't want to fold such a call
    7075             :            permanently.  E.g.:
    7076             :              constexpr int g(int x) { return __builtin_constant_p(x); }
    7077             :              constexpr int v = g(3);
    7078             :            While generating the IL for the call __builtin_constant_p(x), we
    7079             :            don't want to interpret the call (which would yield a false value
    7080             :            since x is not a constant at that point) because that would freeze
    7081             :            the result for any invocation of g.  However, during the evaluation
    7082             :            of g(3), we do want to interpret __builtin_constant_p(x) and that
    7083             :            will yield a true value since x is the known constant 3 at that
    7084             :            point. */
    7085             :         interpreted = FALSE;
    7086             :       } else {
    7087             :         interpreted = TRUE;
    7088             :         if (args == NULL || args->next != NULL) {
    7089             :           /* A malformed __builtin_constant_p construct.  Treat that as not
    7090             :              being constant. */
    7091             :           *(an_integer_value*)result_storage = zero_int;
    7092             :         } else {
    7093             :           /* Put the interpreter in "no side-effects" mode and interpret the
    7094             :              argument.  If successful, the argument is considered "constant"
    7095             :              (i.e., __builtin_constant_p produces a true value).  If
    7096             :              unsuccessful, we can still continue interpretation because no
    7097             :              side-effects took place. */
    7098             :           a_boolean     saved_side_effects_disabled, saved_suspend_diag_list;
    7099             :           a_type_ptr    arg_type = skip_typerefs(args->type);
    7100             :           a_byte_count  n_bytes = expr_result_size(ips, args, arg_type,
    7101             :                                                    p_result);
    7102             :           if (!*p_result) break;
    7103             :           saved_side_effects_disabled = ips->side_effects_disabled;
    7104             :           ips->side_effects_disabled = TRUE;
    7105             :           saved_suspend_diag_list = ips->suspend_diag_list;
    7106             :           ips->suspend_diag_list = TRUE;
    7107             :           alloc_complete_object(ips, n_bytes, arg_type, arg1_bytes);
    7108             :           if (do_constexpr_expression(ips, args, arg1_bytes, arg1_bytes)) {
    7109             :             *(an_integer_value*)result_storage = one_int;
    7110             :           } else {
    7111             :             *(an_integer_value*)result_storage = zero_int;
    7112             :           }  /* if */
    7113             :           ips->side_effects_disabled = saved_side_effects_disabled;
    7114             :           ips->suspend_diag_list = saved_suspend_diag_list;
    7115             :         }  /* if */
    7116             :       }  /* if */
    7117             :       break;
    7118             :    case bfk_abs:
    7119             :       {
    7120             :         interpreted = TRUE;
    7121             :         if (args == NULL || args->next != NULL) {
    7122             :           unexpected_condition();
    7123             :         } else {
    7124             :           a_type_ptr    tp = skip_typerefs(args->type);
    7125             :           a_byte_count  n_bytes = value_bytes_for_type(ips, tp, p_result);
    7126             :           if (!*p_result) break;
    7127             :           check_assertion(tp->kind == (a_type_kind)tk_integer);
    7128             :           alloc_complete_object(ips, n_bytes, tp, arg1_bytes);
    7129             :           if (!do_constexpr_expression(ips, args, arg1_bytes, arg1_bytes)) {
    7130             :             do_constexpr_fail(*p_result);
    7131             :           } else {
    7132             :             an_integer_kind  int_kind = tp->variant.integer.int_kind;
    7133             :             *(an_integer_value*)result_storage =
    7134             :                                                *(an_integer_value*)arg1_bytes;
    7135             :             if (int_kind_is_signed[int_kind] &&
    7136             :                 cmp_integer_values((an_integer_value *)result_storage,
    7137             :                                    /*is_signed=*/TRUE,
    7138             :                                    (an_integer_value *)&zero_int,
    7139             :                                    /*is_signed=*/TRUE) < 0) {
    7140             :               a_boolean  ovfl;
    7141             :               negate_integer_value((an_integer_value *)result_storage, &ovfl);
    7142             :               if (ovfl ||
    7143             :                   cmp_integer_values((an_integer_value *)result_storage,
    7144             :                                      /*is_signed=*/TRUE,
    7145             :                                      &max_integer_value_of_kind[int_kind],
    7146             :                                      /*is_signed=*/TRUE) > 0) {
    7147             :                 do_constexpr_fail(*p_result);
    7148             :                 info_with_pos_type(ec_constexpr_integer_overflow,
    7149             :                                    &call_node->position, tp, ips);
    7150             :               }  /* if */
    7151             :             }  /* if */
    7152             :           }  /* if */
    7153             :         }  /* if */
    7154             :       }
    7155             :       break;
    7156             :     case bfk_fabs:
    7157             :     case bfk_fabsf:
    7158             :     case bfk_fabsl:
    7159             :       {
    7160             :         interpreted = TRUE;
    7161             :         if (args == NULL || args->next != NULL ||
    7162             :             !is_real_floating_type(args->type)) {
    7163             :           unexpected_condition();
    7164             :         } else {
    7165             :           a_type_ptr    tp = skip_typerefs(args->type);
    7166             :           a_byte_count  n_bytes = value_bytes_for_type(ips, tp, p_result);
    7167             :           alloc_complete_object(ips, n_bytes, tp, arg1_bytes);
    7168             :           if (do_constexpr_expression(ips, args, arg1_bytes, arg1_bytes)) {
    7169             :             a_float_kind  fk = tp->variant.float_kind;
    7170             :             if (fp_signbit(fk, fp_value(arg1_bytes))) {
    7171             :               fp_negate(fk, fp_value(arg1_bytes), fp_value(result_storage),
    7172             :                         &err, &depends_on_fp_mode);
    7173             :               check_assertion(!err);
    7174             :             } else {
    7175             :               *fp_value(result_storage) = *fp_value(arg1_bytes);
    7176             :             }  /* if */
    7177             :           } else {
    7178             :             do_constexpr_fail(*p_result);
    7179             :           }  /* if */
    7180             :         }  /* if */
    7181             :       }
    7182             :       break;
    7183             :     case bfk_isnan:
    7184             :     case bfk_isnanf:
    7185             :     case bfk_isnanl:
    7186             :     case bfk_isinf:
    7187             :     case bfk_isinff:
    7188             :     case bfk_isinfl:
    7189             :     case bfk_isfinite:
    7190             :     case bfk_isnormal:
    7191             :     case bfk_signbit:
    7192             :     case bfk_signbitf:
    7193             :     case bfk_signbitl:
    7194             :       {
    7195             :         interpreted = TRUE;
    7196             :         if (args == NULL || args->next != NULL ||
    7197             :             !is_real_floating_type(args->type)) {
    7198             :           unexpected_condition();
    7199             :         } else {
    7200             :           a_type_ptr    tp = skip_typerefs(args->type);
    7201             :           a_byte_count  n_bytes = value_bytes_for_type(ips, tp, p_result);
    7202             :           alloc_complete_object(ips, n_bytes, tp, arg1_bytes);
    7203             :           if (do_constexpr_expression(ips, args, arg1_bytes, arg1_bytes)) {
    7204             :             a_float_kind  fk = tp->variant.float_kind;

    7432             : static a_boolean adjust_this_address(an_interpreter_state    *ips,
    7433             :                                      a_constexpr_address     *this_addr,

    7435             :                                      a_type_ptr              selector_type,
    7436             :                                      an_expr_node_ptr        expr)
    7437             : /*
    7438             : this_addr is the address of an object which is accessed (via a pointer or
    7439             : lvalue of type selector_type) through the given pointer-to-member value.

    7441             : complete object does not contain the accessed subobject) return FALSE and

    7499           8 : static a_boolean eval_selector_arg(an_interpreter_state  *ips,

    7540        3114 : static a_boolean do_constexpr_call(an_interpreter_state  *ips,

    7543             :                                    a_byte                *complete_object)

    7547             : otherwise, return FALSE and update *ips accordingly.

    7626             : #if BUILTIN_FUNCTIONS_ENABLED

    7707             :     /* This process must happen in two phases.  First, the arguments must be
    7708             :        allocated and evaluated.  Only then can we map parameter variables onto
    7709             :        the allocated arguments.  We cannot do the two in a single loop because
    7710             :        of recursive calls.  E.g.:
    7711             :           constexpr void f(int p, int q) {
    7712             :             ...
    7713             :             f(x, p+q);
    7714             :           }
    7715             :        Here, if we remap p to the evaluation of "x" early, the subsequent
    7716             :        evaluation of "p+q" will likely be wrong.  In support of the two-phase
    7717             :        approach, we first allocate a buffer to keep pointers to each argument
    7718             :        location determined in the first phase, so that we can remap them in
    7719             :        the second phase.  We also allocate an additional buffer to keep track
    7720             :        of the sizes of the argument objects, so we can quickly get to their
    7721             :        variable postfix in the second phase. */

    7997           0 : static a_boolean do_constexpr_ctor(an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    7998             :                                    a_dynamic_init_ptr    dip,
    7999             :                                    a_source_position     *pos,
    8000             :                                    a_byte                *result_storage,
    8001             :                                    a_byte                *complete_object,
    8002             :                                    a_constexpr_address   *implied_src)
    8003             : /*
    8004             : Interpret the constructor call represented by the given dynamic initialization
    8005             : entry.  Return TRUE if no error occurred; otherwise, return FALSE and update
    8006             : *ips accordingly.  pos is the position of the call.  The object is constructed
    8007             : at the location indicated by result_storage, which is within the given complete
    8008             : object.  If implied_src is non-NULL, this is a copy/move constructor invocation
    8009             : and the source object is stored at the location indicated by implied_src.
    8010             : 
    8011             : This is similar to do_constexpr_call, but the call has a different
    8012             : representation, and mem-initializers must be interpreted prior to interpreting
    8013             : the body of the (constructor) function proper.
    8014             : */
    8015             : {
    8016           0 :   a_routine_ptr     callee = dip->variant.constructor.ptr;
    8017           0 :   a_boolean         result = TRUE;
    8018             : 
    8019             :   /* Retrieve the routine scope, or issue an error. */
    8020           0 :   if (callee == NULL) {
    8021           0 :     info_with_pos(ec_constexpr_expression_cannot_be_interpreted, pos, ips);
    8022           0 :     do_constexpr_fail(result);
    8023           0 :     goto done;
    8024           0 :   } else if (!callee->is_constexpr) {
    8025           0 :     info_with_pos_sym(ec_constexpr_call_to_nonconstexpr_function,
    8026           0 :                       pos, symbol_for(callee), ips);
    8027           0 :     do_constexpr_fail(result);
    8028           0 :     goto done;
    8029             :   }  /* if */
    8030           0 :   if (!callee->defined) {
    8031           0 :     set_instance_required(symbol_for(callee), TRUE, SIR_CONSTANT_CONTEXT);
    8032             :   }  /* if */
    8033           0 :   if (callee->function_def_number == NULL_function_def_number) {
    8034           0 :     info_with_pos_sym(ec_constexpr_function_undefined, pos,
    8035           0 :                       symbol_for(callee), ips);
    8036           0 :     do_constexpr_fail(result);
    8037           0 :   } else if (callee->is_prototype_instantiation) {
    8038           0 :     info_with_pos_sym(ec_constexpr_call_not_interpretable, pos,
    8039           0 :                       symbol_for(callee), ips);
    8040           0 :     do_constexpr_fail(result);
    8041           0 :   } else if (cost_exceeded(ips)) {
    8042           0 :     more_info_diagnostic(ec_excessive_constexpr_complexity, &ips->position,
    8043           0 :                          &ips->diag_list);
    8044           0 :     do_constexpr_fail(result);
    8045             :   } else {
    8046           0 :     a_scope_ptr          callee_scope = scope_for_routine(callee);
    8047           0 :     a_statement_ptr      block_stmt = callee_scope->assoc_block;
    8048           0 :     a_call_frame         frame;

    8422             : 
    8423             : 
    8424             : static a_constant_ptr make_interpreter_copy_of_constant(
    8425             :                                                    an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    8426             :                                                    a_constant_ptr        con)
    8427             : /*
    8428             : Copy the given constant to a new ("local") entry and record it on a list

    8431             : {
    8432             :   a_constant_ptr  new_con = local_constant();
    8433             :

    8439             : 
    8440             : 
    8441           0 : static a_boolean get_value_from_address_constant(
    8442             :                                                an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    8443             :                                                a_constant_ptr        addr_con,
    8444             :                                                a_byte                *value)
    8445             : /*

    8449             : {

    8462             : 
    8463             : 
    8464             : /*ARGSUSED*/  /* complete_object is not currently used. */
    8465             : static a_boolean do_constexpr_offsetof(an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    8466             :                                        an_expr_node_ptr      expr,
    8467             :                                        a_byte                *result_storage,
    8468             :                                        a_byte                *complete_object)
    8469             : /*
    8470             : Evaluate, if possible, the given __builtin_offsetof expression (whose second
    8471             : operand should be a chain of subscript and field selection nodes applied to a
    8472             : constant null pointer).  If successful, return TRUE and store the result in
    8473             : *result_storage.  Otherwise, return FALSE and record a diagnostic in *ips.
    8474             : */

    8476             :   a_boolean         result = TRUE;

    8481             : 
    8482             :   set_integer_value(&offset_val, (a_host_large_integer)0);

    8498             :         do_constexpr_fail(result);

    8660             : static a_boolean check_boolean_condition(an_interpreter_state  *ips,

    8807             : static a_boolean acceptable_lvalue_conversion(an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    8808             :                                               a_constexpr_address   *cap,

    8810             :                                               a_type_ptr            dst_type)
    8811             : /*
    8812             : Return TRUE if converting the given lvalue of type src_type to dst_type using
    8813             : an eok_lvalue_cast or eok_lvalue_adjust node is acceptable in a constant-

    8817             : interpreter context.

    8826             :     valid = TRUE;

    8831             :     a_type_ptr  etp = skip_typerefs(dst_type->variant.array.element_type);

    8835             :           [lvalue] operator: lvalue adjust, result type: array [1] of const int

    8838             :                 constant: value = {}

    8841             :          we are not in a function scope. */

    8843             :       if (ips->curr_call_frame == NULL) {

    8853           0 : static a_boolean do_constexpr_bound_expr(

    8894           0 : static a_boolean do_constexpr_lambda(an_interpreter_state *ips,

    8897             :                                      a_byte               *complete_object)

    9107             : static a_boolean offset_runtime_address(an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    9108             :                                         a_source_position     *diag_pos,
    9109             :                                         a_constexpr_address   *cap,
    9110             :                                         a_host_large_integer  count,
    9111             :                                         a_byte_count          elem_size,
    9112             :                                         a_boolean             subtract)
    9113             : /*
    9114             : Offset the given address constant by count*elem_size (if subtract is FALSE) or
    9115             : -count*elem_size (if subtract is TRUE).  That address constant is usually a
    9116             : ck_address entry, but it also can be a ck_integer entry (e.g., resulting from
    9117             : a construct like "(char*)0x1234").  In case of overflow, record a diagnostic
    9118             : for the given position and return FALSE.  Otherwise, return TRUE.
    9119             : */

    9121             :   an_integer_value  delta, tmp;

    9166             : 
    9167       13967 : static a_boolean do_constexpr_expression(
    9168             :                                        an_interpreter_state  *ips,
    9169             :                                        an_expr_node_ptr      orig_expr,
    9170             :                                        a_byte                *result_storage,
    9171             :                                        a_byte                *complete_object)
    9172             : /*
    9173             : Interpret the given expression in the given interpreter context.  If
    9174             : successful return TRUE and store the result at *result_storage (which is
    9175             : storage within the given complete object).  Otherwise, return FALSE and update 
    9176             : *ips accordingly.  A glvalue result is represented as an a_constexpr_address
    9177             : value, so result_storage must be at least large enough for that type;
    9178             : otherwise, it need only be large enough for the type of the prvalue result.
    9179             : */
    9180             : {
    9181       13967 :   a_boolean            result = TRUE;

    9189       13967 :   if (!result) goto done;

    9246             : 
    9247             : /*
    9248             : If is_signed is TRUE, the following macro sets result to FALSE if the integer

   13334           0 : static void translate_interpreter_offset(an_interpreter_state  *ips,
   13335             :                                          a_constexpr_address   *cap,
   13336             :                                          a_constant_ptr        con)
   13337             : /*
   13338             : cap represents an interpreter address pointing into interpreter storage.
   13339             : Record in con->variant.address.offset the corresponding target offset for a
   13340             : ck_address constant representing the same address.  Also record the associated
   13341             : subobject path.
   13342             : */
   13343             : {
   13344           0 :   a_targ_ptrdiff_t  t_offset = 0; /* Total target offset. */
   13345           0 :   a_byte            *address = cap->address;
   13346             : 
   13347           0 :   if (address != cap->complete_object) {
   13348           0 :     a_byte                *parent_address = cap->complete_object;
   13349           0 :     a_field_ptr           fp = NULL;
   13350           0 :     a_base_class_ptr      bcp = NULL;

   13352           0 :     a_type_ptr            type = complete_object_type(parent_address);
   13353             : 
   13354           0 :     if (cannot_dereference(cap)) {
   13355           0 :       a_boolean     result = TRUE;
   13356           0 :       a_byte_count  n_bytes = value_bytes_for_type(ips, type, &result);
   13357           0 :       check_assertion(result);

   13427         523 : static a_boolean copy_interpreter_object_to_constant(
   13428             :                                        an_interpreter_state  *ips,
   13429             :                                        a_byte                *object,
   13430             :                                        a_byte                *complete_object,

   13432             :                                        a_constant_ptr        con)
   13433             : /*

   13435             : type produced by the interpreter.  Create in *con a constant representing

   13901           1 : a_boolean is_core_constant_expr(an_expr_node_ptr  expr,
   13902             :                                 a_diag_list_ptr   diag_list)
   13903             : /*
   13904             : Return TRUE if the given expression is a "core constant expression".  
   13905             : Otherwise, return FALSE, and record diagnostic info in *diag_list.
   13906             : This is very similar to interpret_expr below, but the result of the evaluation
   13907             : in terms of interpreter values is not copied back to an IL representation (that
   13908             : copy would diagnose cases that are core constant expressions but not "constant

   13919             :     /* The expression is already a constant. */
   13920           0 :     goto done;

   13923             : #if DO_IL_LOWERING
   13924             :       || il_lowering_underway
   13925             : #endif /* DO_IL_LOWERING */

   13939             :       /* Interpretation failed due to an error node in the IL.  Continue
   13940             :          with an error constant, but treat interpretation as successful. */
   13941           0 :       result = TRUE;

   13944             :   } else {

   14344             : Release the persistent storage stack and the persistent map (making that
   14345             : storage available for another compilation, if any).
   14346             : */
